column1: # A couple problems with this format:
# Lots of repetition; e.g. if we could put WITH_THREAD_PROFILING=1 EXTRA_FLAGS="-DUSE_FINE_TIMER" in a variable
# and then re-use that variable instead of retyping that stuff, that would be great
# The last column has arguments to pass to the tool, but the arguments (e.g. paired-end constraints) might vary

column4: WITH_THREAD_PROFILING=1 EXTRA_FLAGS="-DUSE_FINE_TIMER" WITH_TBB=1 WITH_AFFINITY=1 NO_SPINLOCK=1 WITH_QUEUELOCK=1
WITH_THREAD_PROFILING=1 EXTRA_FLAGS="-DUSE_FINE_TIMER" WITH_TBB=1 WITH_AFFINITY=1 WITH_QUEUELOCK=1 WITH_COHORTLOCK=1
